text: Goodreads is a free database of books, authors, and book reviews. In December 2007, it had 10,000,000 books in its database. In Goodreads, a user can do the following things: * Sign up and register books * Rate & Review books * Generate library catalogs * Generate Reading lists * Create their own groups of book suggestions * Surveys, polls, blogs, and discussions Goodreads is owned by Amazon. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:Amazon (company) Category:Databases
title: Goodreads
